name: Knives
bio: With more than a decade of DJing experience and over a dozen residencies spanning two states, DJ Knives is probably already one of your DJs favorite DJs. As an open format wizard Knives plays every genre you can think of from Hip-Hop, Pop Top 40, Latin, EDM, and more, while cohesively blending all BPMs and styles together throughout a night and make crowds of diverse ages, races and backgrounds happy. Turning his passion for underground House & Techno into San Francisco Based promotion company and artist collective Dirty Not Sorry, Knives has become a local taste maker in the SF scene, bringing many national and international artists to the city for the first time in order to spread his love for Dirty House and Techno music. Catch him on one of his weekly livestreams spanning over 150 episodes where he shares brand new music every single week.
